explanation: Funds are required to support Instrumented Joint Test Assembly (JTA) Reentry Vehicles (JTA4 and JTA6) for Minuteman III flight testing. This funding covers the Air Force portion of the JTA Reentry Vehicle production contract with the National Nuclear Security Administration. Without this additional funding, instrumented JTAs will not be available for Minuteman III flight test resulting in ‘cancellation of Minuteman III flight tests. The funding for JTAs was included in the FY 2023 budget request, however a portion of the funding was diverted to the Flight Test Telemetry and Termination (FT3) system due to higher than anticipated costs for FT3.

Funds are available because of lower costs than budgeted for engineering change orders and risk mitigation on the Intercontinental Ballistic Missile (ICBM) Fuze Modernization program. The program ‘{ executed its required scope in FY 2023 and did not realize these costs. There is no anticipated impact to the "| program, and the funding is available for other requirement.
